feature.label: RosMixedPortFeature
feature.description:
This feature extends the SmartMDSD Toolchain by a ROS MixedPort Component functionality that has been developed by the SeRoNet Project consortium: http://www.seronet-projekt.de
The ROS Mixed-Port Component is developed by: - Service Robotics Research Center of Ulm University of Applied Sciences - Fraunhofer Institute for Manufacturing Engineering and Automation IPA
CAUTION: This software is a preview for the purpose of technology demonstration. It is experimental and comes with no support. Use at your own risk.
